description: Nanosensorics is Lithuanian capital company. Our private equity company was built with the idea of the research and development, production of the smart IoT sensors. Our products directly impacts the significant increase of the efficient utilisation of the energy resources and carbon emission savings. We offer sustainable building, industrial sensors based on promising interfaces such as LoRA. Our team is formed of highly qualified professionals with more than 15 years of experience in sensorics, electronic hardware, software development which has been supplied for the long-term customers worldwide.
